}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Model: [[Oolite MT7620DA]] (V1.1) (OEM: Guangdong, China) *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620DA @580MHz (MIPS 24KEc) â€¢ [https://sc01.alicdn.com/kf/HTB1zZS7XirxK1RkHFCc763QCVXaG/231811533/HTB1zZS7XirxK1RkHFCc763QCVXaG.png BD] *Flash: SPI 16MB (8/32/64MB); RAM: DDR2 64MB (in WiSoC) *Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn 2T2R (300Mbps); Antenna: 2x U.FL (IPEX) *Ethernet: 5x 10/100Mbps ports; USB: 1x USB 2.0 (Host) port *Packaging: 92-pin (LCC); Dimension: 30mm x 30mm x 2.3mm
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
